title: My Game Never Existed?
body:
I was playing a ranked game today and 7 minutes in my game disconnected. I was sitting in lane waitingfor it to reconnect for about 2 minutes until i attempted to leave the game then reconnect. When I left, it didn't give me the option to rejoin it was just the main page. So I checked my match history and there was nothing! I started up another game and I have no leaverbuster. Can someone explain wtf just happened?

Edit: Coincidentally it was the last game in my promo series, but the game I started after to check for leaverbuster I won and got promoted.

replies.body: Ahhhh sounds like that game must have crashed entirely from the server. It's not all that common, but when it does happen it has these symptoms. You're able to re-queue immediately since the client can't find a game to reconnect to, nobody will get any penalties, and the game simply doesn't exist anymore!
